name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior JavaScript Engineer with over 10 years of experience in delivering robust web applications and backend systems, leveraging skills in **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, **React**, and **Vue.js**. Proficient in utilizing modern web technologies including **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **SASS**, and **LESS** to create intuitive and high-performance user interfaces. Strong background in agile methodologies such as Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) and expertise in tools like **Git**, **Webpack**, and **Gulp**. Proven ability to design scalable microservices and APIs, with a track record of successful projects for leading companies like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. Committed to excellence with a passion for continuous learning and staying updated with industry trends.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **JavaScript** and frameworks like **React** and **Vue.js** to develop and enhance user interfaces for document automation and reporting workflows.
Engineered responsive web applications using **HTML5**, **CSS3**, **LESS**, and **SASS**, adhering to modern web standards with versions **ECMAScript 5** and **ECMAScript 6**.
Implemented microservice architecture principles in application development to ensure scalability and maintainability of software solutions.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams using **Git** for version control and coordination, managing over **12** release cycles per year effectively.
Employed **Node.js** and tools like **Gulp** and **Webpack** for optimizing build processes, improving load time by **25%**.
Conducted behavior-driven development (BDD) practices with **Playwright** to enhance software testing processes and improve user experience.
Engaged in continuous integration and deployment strategies to streamline development and delivery of features, maintaining up to **100%** code coverage in critical modules.

Utilized **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and **React** to enhance user interfaces and create dynamic web applications, focusing on ECMAScript 5 and 6 standards.
Leveraged **HTML5** and **CSS3** to build responsive layouts and ensure cross-browser compatibility, maintaining an adherence to design specifications across **9** different projects.
Implemented **microservice architecture** principles to enhance scalability and maintainability in application design, resulting in a **25%** reduction in deployment times.
Employed **Git** for version control and collaboration within teams, ensuring code integrity across **10+** contributors during the development cycle.
Integrated **Gulp** and **Webpack** for task automation and optimizing asset delivery, leading to a **15%** improvement in loading speeds.
Conducted code reviews and employed **Behavior-Driven Development** methodologies to improve code quality and facilitate better understanding among team members, impacting **8** key deliverables.
Monitored application performance and user feedback to iteratively improve features with an emphasis on user experience and functionality.

Utilized **JavaScript**, **React**, and **Node.js** to develop engaging frontend applications that enhance user experience and streamline interactions.
Employed **Git** for version control in managing code changes across projects, ensuring efficient collaboration within a team of **9** developers.
Designed and implemented microservices architecture that improved system scalability and reduced service response times by **30%**.
Oversaw the integration of **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **ECMAScript 6** to create responsive and visually appealing user interfaces.
Conducted unit and integration testing using **Playwright** and Behavior-Driven Development (BDD) practices to maintain high-quality standards and minimize defects in production.
Optimized build processes with **Gulp** and **Webpack**, reducing build times by **25%** in environments with multiple dependencies.
Mentored junior developers in best practices for modern JavaScript development and introduced tools like **SASS** and **LESS** for efficient stylesheet management.

skills:
**Frontend Frameworks**
	JavaScript, React, HTML5, CSS3, ECMAScript 5, ECMAScript 6, DOM, LESS, SASS, Node.js, Gulp, Webpack, Vue.js, jQuery, TypeScript, Playwright

**Backend Frameworks**
	Python (3.8+), FastAPI, Flask, Django, Celery

**API Technologies**
	REST/gRPC APIs, Microservices, Behavior-Driven Development, microservice architecture, Kafka

**Cloud & Infrastructure**
	AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda), Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, GitHub Actions, Azure DevOps

**Databases**
	PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis

**DevOps**
	CI/CD, PyTest, Git

**AI/ML Tools**
	Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Airflow, MLflow

**Other**
	Git
